vis_fields.f90

00001 ! ======================
00002 !
00003 !   VIS_FIELDS
00004 !
00005 !   Send field data to VISIT for surface visualisation
00006 !
00007 !
00008 ! ======================
00009 
00010 subroutine vis_fields
00011 
00012 
00013   use physvars
00014   use treevars
00015   implicit none   
00016   include 'mpif.h'
00017 
00018   real, dimension(ngx*ngy*ngz) :: qvis,mvis
00019   real, dimension(0:ngx+1,0:ngy+1,0:ngz+1) :: bzg
00020   real :: s, simtime, dummy, xd,yd,zd, dx, dz, dy, epond_max
00021   real :: box_max, az_em, ez_em, by_em, bx_em, bz_em, ex_em, ey_em, phipond
00022   real :: epon_x, epon_y, epon_z, tpon, amp_las
00023   integer, parameter :: ngmax=100
00024   integer :: i, j, k, ioffset,ixd, iyd, izd, ilev, lcount, iskip,itlas
00025   integer :: lvisit_active, ierr
00026   integer :: npx, npy, npz, ng
00027   integer :: iskip_x, iskip_y, iskip_z
00028 
00029   simtime = dt*(itime+itime_start)
00030   amp_las = vosc*min(1.,simtime/tpulse)
00031 
00032   ng = (ngx+2)*(ngy+2)*(ngz+2)                         ! total # gridpoints
00033   ! Merge sums for Bz
00034   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(bz_loc, bzg, ng, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00035 
00036   if (me==0 ) then
00037 
00038      box_max = xl/25.
00039      epond_max = sqrt(1.+vosc**2/2.)/2.
00040      lcount=0
00041 
00042      ! limit size of field data to 100^3
00043      !     iskip_x = ngx/ngmax + 1
00044      !     iskip_y = ngy/ngmax + 1
00045      !     iskip_z = ngz/ngmax + 1
00046      iskip_x = 1
00047      iskip_y = 1
00048      iskip_z = 1
00049 
00050 
00051      !     npx = ngx/iskip_x + mod(ngx,2)
00052      !     npy = ngy/iskip_y + mod(ngy,2)
00053      !     npz = ngz/iskip_z + mod(ngz,2)
00054      npx = ngx
00055      npy = ngy
00056      npz = ngz
00057 
00058      dx = xl/ngx
00059      dz = zl/ngz
00060      dy = yl/ngy
00061      do k=1,ngz,iskip_z
00062         do j=1,ngy,iskip_y
00063            do i=1,ngx,iskip_x
00064               lcount=lcount+1
00065               xd = (i-0.5)*dx - focus(1) ! position relative to laser focus
00066               yd = (j-0.5)*dy - focus(2)
00067               zd = (k-0.5)*dz - focus(3)
00068 !              xd = (i-0.5)*dx - 50.
00069 
00070               laser: select case(beam_config_in)
00071 
00072               case(4)
00073                  call fpond( 1.57/omega, tpulse,sigma,vosc,omega, rho_upper, &
00074                       xd,yd,zd,epon_x,epon_y,epon_z,phipond)
00075                  Tpon = min(1.,tlaser/tpulse) * (sin(omega*tlaser))**2
00076                  !                 mvis(lcount) = epon_x/omega ! Pond field, EM norm
00077                  mvis(lcount) = phipond ! Pond potential
00078 
00079               case(5)  ! propagating fpond
00080                  call laser_bullet( tlaser, focus(1), tpulse,sigma,vosc,omega, &
00081                       xd,yd,zd,epon_x,epon_y,epon_z,phipond)
00082                  mvis(lcount) = phipond ! Pond potential
00083 
00084               case(14) ! Oblique incidence fpond, s-pol
00085                  call emobliq(tlaser,tpulse,sigma,vosc,omega,theta_beam, rho_upper, &
00086                       xd,yd,zd,epon_x,epon_y,epon_z,phipond,ez_em,bx_em,by_em)
00087                  mvis(lcount) = ez_em**2
00088 
00089               case(6) ! Plane wave
00090                  call emplane(tlaser,tpulse,sigma,vosc,omega,xd,yd,zd,ez_em,by_em,bx_em,az_em,phipond)
00091                  mvis(lcount) = by_em 
00092 
00093               case default ! Propagating fpond
00094                  phipond = 0  
00095                  mvis(lcount) = 0.
00096                  mvis(lcount) = rhoi(i,j,k)/omega**2   ! electron density /nc
00097               end select laser
00098 
00099               !              qvis(lcount) = ez_em 
00100               qvis(lcount) = 100*bzg(i,j,k)   ! Bz
00101            end do
00102         end do
00103      end do
00104 !     call flvisit_spk_check_connection(lvisit_active)
00105      !     call flvisit_spk_info_send(npart,xl,yl,zl,zl,ne,ni,np_beam,itime+itime_start)
00106      itlas=int(tlaser)
00107 
00108      !        call flvisit_spk_info_send(npart,xl,yl,zl, zl, &
00109      !             x_crit, amp_las, sigma, tpulse, &
00110      !             ne,ni,npart,itlas)
00111 
00112      !     if (beam_config>=4) call flvisit_spk_3dfieldA_send(mvis,npx,npy,npz)  ! laser potential
00113 !     call flvisit_spk_3dfieldB_send(mvis,npx,npy,npz)  ! ion density 
00114 !     call flvisit_spk_3dfieldA_send(qvis,npx,npy,npz)  ! ship selected field
00115   endif
00116 
00117 
00118 end subroutine vis_fields
